comment.author: 15826935@N06
comment._content: I believe this is his information. I found only two Walter Guess's in the US National Archives Military Records. The other Walter Guess didn't join the service until 1943. Sgt. Walter J Guess US Army s/n 39153168 b. Jan 11, 1912 d. Jun 10, 1996 Buried at Los Angeles National Cemetery aad.archives.gov/aad/record-detail.jsp?dt=893&mtch=2&...
